teaser: Home prices rise, but can they boost the job market?
title: Home prices are up, will the job market follow?
contentencoded:
New numbers out this morning show home prices are up by 8.1 percent over last year, the best yearly increase since 2006.

Juli Niemann, analyst with Smith, Moore & Company joins Marketplace's Mark Garrison explain the rise and whether it will boost the job market.
